title: Unshackled Demons
description: 'If you want someone dead, make sure they die'Abandoned in the middle of the forest and left to die, Claraicy harbors a lot of resentment towards those who had physically and emotionally abused her. After being infected by Doctor Scott's genetically modified cells, she finds that she is much more resilient and stronger than she ever thought possible.While being hunted by those who want her dead, she strikes back. As her gruesome merciless acts of revenge hit the press, the doctor's elite force of professional soldiers are forced to go to extreme lengths to subdue her. As frustration mounts, the blood-thirsty demons on both sides become unshackled.With Claraicy's body genetically altered to withstand almost anything Mother Nature and man can throw at it, her mind becomes fixated on her hatred towards the person she despised the most, Santa Claus.for more information about the book go to:www.richardmyerscough.com
author: Richard Myerscough
